metadata.title: CVE-2025-24970 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Netty, an asynchronous, event-driven network application framework, has avulnerability starting in version 4.1.91.Final and prior to version4.1.118.Final. When a special crafted packet is received via SslHandler itdoesn't correctly handle validation of such a packet in all cases which canlead to a native crash. Version 4.1.118.Final contains a patch. Asworkaround its possible to either disable the usage of the native SSLEngineor change the code manually.

criterions.comment: netty package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
